column5: Come have a stay at our home to enjoy a nice twist of liberal ideals mixed with the right touch of southern twang. We are a friendly mix of people looking to provide you with a quiet night before your next flight or an eventful evening to help you along your journey. We keep the temperature cool, and the coffee hot, just like the weather. See you soon. Marilyn
column8: Quiet cottage setting a stones throw from DFW RM#1
